page.title: 10GREAT PLANTATION LIVERTON
page.content: The{Great Plantation}is a large area of woodland. It mainly has{Coniferous} trees like{Scots pine, Norway spruce and other various types of fir. There are also{Deciduous}trees. These are Oak, Silver Birch, Beech, Willow, Holly, Rowan and Hazel. In the woods there are lots of animals.These include rabbits, squirrels, badgers, foxes, and various small mammals.Also in the marshy pond areas there are amphibians such as frogs, toads and newts.The undergrowth under the trees is boggy with Wild grasses, Gorse, Stinging nettles, Brambles, different types of heather, ferns, bracken and bilberry bushes.Lots of streams go through the woods and ditches have been dug to carry away surplus.In the woods there are{underground ammunition {stores}where explosives are kept for use in quarries throughout Devon.
